summary: After 3 years in prison, Julian breaks out and returns to Vegas to get his half from the bank robbery and see Lucille again. The Devil took the loot and Tuerto took Lucille.
cast: Dylan McDermott|Nancy Travis|James Le Gros|Quentin Tarantino|Jim Belushi|Janet Carroll|David Cross|Richard Edson|Bobcat Goldthwait|Barry Shabaka Henley|Lisa Jane Persky|Sarah Trigger|Tracey Walter|Allen Garfield|Ralph Brannen|Robert Sparks|Gordon Michaels|Che Lujan|Michael O'Connell|Michael Matthys|Brandi Payne
title: Johnny Destiny
